评论概述: Great coat for a great price!
评论详情: I usually wear a L (12/14) but I ordered an XL Coat to allow for heavier sweaters…it’s perfect! The quality of the material & workmanship is very good & the Maple Red color is a beautiful darker rich red. The coat is very soft, warm & fully lined.  The quality of the buttons has been mentioned in several reviews & I find  the overall quality of these molded metal buttons (2 lions facing a crown like crest) definitely of acceptable quality. On my coat the buttons are sewed on well and there are no sharp edges

评论概述: Doesn't Know What It Wants To Be
评论详情: So, this coat (?) just doesn't know what it wants to be...is it a long Blazer? A shorter coat? A heavy indoor jacket? It doesn't know. The idea of this item is great, as was the price point (got it on sale). But here's what I know:  It's pretty shapeless, a symptom of its identity crisis. This is OK if you want to layer heavily under it, but really, who would want such an elegant look loaded up with bulk underneath? It's all wrong.  Came out of the packaging missing a prominent button right at the front - which is a bad look because all the buttons are prominent. That's the point. It's such a classic look, but when one is missing it's like a smile with a front tooth knocked out.  The fabric quality isn't bad, but it's really not outerwear. Then again, I'm from Boston and looking for outerwear that's actually going to keep me warm. The buttons, on the other hand - well, the remaining ones - are super-shiny and as such, look wicked cheap.  I wanted to love this, but back it goes...

评论概述: Loved it! You will be pleased!
评论详情: Great quality coat, nice weight/warm, soft to the touch fabric (not the stiff itchy wool), stylish with gold buttons that add a sense of sophistication to this classic peacoat creating versatility!  This coat could easily be paired with jeans as shown, topping a pantsuit/pants to the office or adding a touch of class to dresses/skirts with boots or heels!  A great addition to any wardrobe!!!!  Polished fit! 5’2”, 130lbs Size 4; great fit enough room to top most clothes comfortably

Hi, I just received my black pea coat w/gold colored buttons; WOW!! This black coat is so sharp looking & sexy! I read many reviews about the buttons falling off, so I'm going to reinforce the buttons. It goes down to approx. mid-calf on me. For reference, I'm 180 lbs, 5'5", 36C, & I normally wear a large in shirts, & approx size 16 in pants. I ordered an XL in this black, sexy coat! It fits great...I do have VERY small shoulders tho', & this coat fits me perfectly! I could NOT wear a thick sweater under the coat, it wouldn't fit, but I can wear a top underneath, no problem. WOW! I'm so impressed w/this coat!! Looks EXACTLY like the pictures. Thank you seller & Amazon! Happy Holidays to all! -Miss D
